casebody.data:
Anthony SANTOS
v.
ZONING BOARD OF APPEALS OF the TOWN OF STRATFORD, et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided October 18, 2017

Ian A. Cole, in support of the petition.

Sean R. Plumb, in opposition.

The plaintiffs petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 531, 166 A.3d 20 (2017), is denied.
